top.parak.kraft.core.log.sequence

类 EntryIndexFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.parak.kraft.core.log.sequence.EntryIndexFile
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Iterable<EntryIndexItem>

    public class EntryIndexFile
extends Object
implements Iterable<EntryIndexItem>
    Log entry index file.

    Structure of log entry index file

    EntryIndexFile starts with the start index and end index, followed by mata information of the log entry, including the position offset in the EntriesFile, the log entry kind and the log entry term. 
     +---------------+---------------+
 |     int(4)    |     int(4)    |
 +---------------+---------------+
 | minEntryIndex | maxEntryIndex |
 +-------------------------------+---------------+---------------+
 |             long(8)           |     int(4)    |     int(4)    |
 +-------------------------------+---------------+---------------+
 |             offset            |      kind     |      term     |
 +-------------------------------+---------------+---------------+
 |             offset            |      kind     |      term     |
 +-------------------------------+---------------+---------------+
    EntryIndexFile does not store the log entry index, because the index value can be calculated. For example, the index of the first log entry is minEntryIndex, then the index of the second log entry is minEntryIndex + 1, and the index of the last log entry is maxEntryIndex.
    从以下版本开始:
    2022-04-02
    作者:
    KHighness

      • appendEntryIndex

        public void appendEntryIndex(int index,
                             long offset,
                             int kind,
                             int term)
                      throws IOException
        Append a log entry index to the index file.
        参数:
        index - the index of the log entry
        offset - the offset of the log entry stored in sequence
        kind - the index of the log entry
        term - the term of the log entry
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO exception occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if index != maxEntryIndex + 1

      • removeAfter

        public void removeAfter(int newMaxEntryIndex)
                 throws IOException
        Remove log entries index whose index is greater than the specified index.
        参数:
        newMaxEntryIndex - new max log entry index
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO exception occurs

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws IOException
        Clear the index file.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO exception occurs

      • getOffset

        public long getOffset(int entryIndex)
        Get the offset of the log entry whose index equals to the specified index.
        参数:
        entryIndex - the specified index
        返回:
        the offset of the log entry

      • get

        @Nonnull
public EntryIndexItem get(int entryIndex)
        Get the entry index item whose index equals to the specified index.
        参数:
        entryIndex - the specified index
        返回:
        the entry index item
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if entryIndex < minEntryIndex or entryIndex > maxEntryIndex

      • iterator

        @Nonnull
public Iterator<EntryIndexItem> iterator()
        指定者:
        iterator 在接口中 Iterable<EntryIndexItem>
